comments.body: Normally you should avoid making changes that are not related to your PR.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -59,8 +59,7 @@ private[yarn] class AMCredentialRenewer(
   private var lastCredentialsFileSuffix = 0
 
   private val credentialRenewer =
-    Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor(
-      ThreadUtils.namedThreadFactory("Credential Refresh Thread"))
+    ThreadUtils.newDaemonSingleThreadScheduledExecutor("Credential Refresh Thread")

comments.body: I generally agree, but I made this change to keep these two classes as congruent as possible. I can change it back if you feel strongly.
